entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or drizzle beginning in the evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
